question: In the Wano Country Arc, what is the name of the floating island fortress that Zoro helps prevent from crashing onto the Flower Capital?
Which member of the Beasts Pirates' All-Stars does Zoro defeat in battle while the floating island of Onigashima is at risk of destruction?
What advanced Haki technique does Zoro subconsciously use to scar Kaido during the battle to prevent Onigashima's destruction?
